repl_text_main_desc: Returns an ndarray containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from a Poisson distribution.
repl_text_assign_desc: Fills an ndarray with pseudorandom numbers drawn from a Poisson distribution.
repl_text_factory_desc: Returns a function for generating pseudorandom numbers drawn from a Poisson distribution.
repl_text_param_1_desc: Mean parameter. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the specified array shape.
repl_text_assign_param_1_desc: Mean parameter. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the provided output array.
